title: Mastodon
description:
Mastodon is the most popular ActivityPub fediverse implementation.

It is compatible with Meta's Threads.
requirements:
Requires:

- IPv6rs WG Configuration
- DNS AAAA record pointed to your IPv6rs IP
- DNS A record pointed to your IPv6rs gateway IP

title: Ollama OpenWeb-UI
description:
Ollama and OpenWeb-UI gives you an AI LLM to chat with locally and remotely.

Chat confidentially without a middleman.
requirements:
Requires:

- IPv6rs WG Configuration
- DNS AAAA record pointed to your IPv6rs IP
- DNS A record pointed to your IPv6rs gateway IP
- Ollama running on the host computer
- OLLAMA_HOST set to 0.0.0.0
- See https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/faq.md#how-do-i-configure-ollama-server
